Package int3.team2.website.pantry_loogr.presentation

Class IndexController

java.lang.Object
int3.team2.website.pantry_loogr.presentation.IndexController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/") public class IndexController extends Object
The index page is the welcoming page the user lands in when first entering the website. The user can log in or register to a new account

    • loginUser

      @RequestMapping(value="/login", method=POST, consumes="application/x-www-form-urlencoded") public String loginUser(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession, @RequestBody org.springframework.util.MultiValueMap<String,String> loginData)

    • register

      @GetMapping("/register") public String register(org.springframework.ui.Model model)

    • registerUser

      @RequestMapping(value="/register", method=POST, consumes="application/x-www-form-urlencoded") public String registerUser(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession, @RequestBody org.springframework.util.MultiValueMap<String,String> data)
      fetches the information given by the register form and checks if the email & username are not already taken if they are, user is not created
      Parameters:
      httpSession - used to identify the user
      data - data provided by the form in the form of a Map
      Returns:
      redirects either to the pantry list of the newly registered user or to the register page if something went wrong

    • checkUsername

      @RequestMapping(value="/checkUsername", method=GET, produces="application/json") @ResponseBody public boolean checkUsername(@RequestParam("username") String username)

      @RequestMapping(value="/checkEmail", method=GET, produces="application/json") @ResponseBody public boolean checkEmail(@RequestParam("email") String email)
